description: ((p-1)/2)! mod p for odd primes p.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9999 [b-file corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 04 2010]
prog: (PARI) lista(n)=forprime(p=3, n, print1(((p-1)/2)! % p, ", ")); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 24 2013(PARI) a(n,p=prime(n+1))=lift(prod(k=2,p\2,k,Mod(1,p))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 01 2016(MAGMA) [Factorial((p-1) div 2) mod p: p in PrimesInInterval(3,350)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 01 2016
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_
